instructions: On your smart TV, go to the settings for Apple HomeKit and find a QR code. If you need help finding these settings, contact the manufacturer. On your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch, open the Home app, tap , then tap Add Accessory. Use the camera on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch to scan the QR code on your TV screen. Wait for your smart TV to be added. Give your TV a name and choose a room where it s located . Tap Done.
